eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner

Class ScannerException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner.ScannerException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ScannerException
extends Exception
    Generated scanners throw exceptions of this description to signal scanning problems. This class is immutable.
    Version:
    $Revision: 52656 $
    Author:
    $Author: hummelb $
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScannerException

        public ScannerException(eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner.ETokenType type,
                        String yyText,
                        int position)
        Create a new ScannerException.
        Parameters:
        type - the token type representing the scanner error. Expected to have token class ETokenType.ETokenClass.ERROR.
        yyText - A verbatim copy of the scanned text.
        position - The line number where the problem occurred.
